subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Saimes, regarded as one of the American Football League’s best safeties, spent seven seasons with the Buffalo Bills and helped them win A.F.L. championships in 1964 and ’65.
snippet: Saimes, regarded as one of the American Football League’s best safeties, spent seven seasons with the Buffalo Bills and helped them win A.F.L. championships in 1964 and ’65.
